This is problemly a stupid question but can I play the normal CIV with this download? The only thing that i can open is the colonization game, please help ..

Yes. It seems like the installation failed to make shortcuts. Go to where the game installed itself, and you'll find the other .exe files. There should be 4 altogether; Regular Civ, Warlords, Colonization, and Beyond The Sword. Colonization is in another folder.
